languages.text: "Восхитительно! Люди вас обожают и боятся, и нужна еще капелька усилий, чтобы открыть им глаза..." {n}Она понижает голос.{/n} "...что их бог прямо здесь, во плоти".

"It is marvellous! Your people adore and fear you, and all it takes is a little effort to open their eyes to the only truth..." {n}She lowers her voice.{/n} "...that their god is right here, in the flesh."
languages.original_text: "Восхитительно! Люди вас обожают и боятся, и нужна еще капелька усилий, чтобы открыть им глаза..." {n}Она понижает голос.{/n} "...что их бог прямо здесь, во плоти".

"It is marvellous! Your people adore and fear you, and all it takes is a little effort to open their eyes to the only truth..." {n}She lowers her voice.{/n} "...that their god is right here, in the flesh."

languages.text: "Das ist wunderbar! Eure Leute bewundern und fürchten Euch, und es bedarf keiner großen Anstrengung, ihnen die Augen für die einzige Wahrheit zu öffnen ..." {n}Sie senkt ihre Stimme.{/n} "... dass ihr Gott bereits hier ist, in Fleisch und Blut."
languages.original_text: "It is marvellous! Your people adore and fear you, and all it takes is a little effort to open their eyes to the only truth..." {n}She lowers her voice.{/n} "...that their god is right here, in the flesh."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist wunderbar! Eure Leute bewundern und fürchten Euch, und es bedarf keiner großen Anstrengung, ihnen die Augen für die einzige Wahrheit zu öffnen ..." {n}Sie senkt ihre Stimme.{/n} "... dass ihr Gott bereits hier ist, in Fleisch und Blut."

languages.text: « C'est tout bonnement merveilleux ! Vos sujets vous craignent autant qu'ils vous adorent. Il vous suffira d'un rien pour leur ouvrir les yeux sur l'unique vérité... » {n}Elle baisse la voix.{/n} « ... Que leur dieu est ici même, en chair et en os. »
languages.original_text: "It is marvellous! Your people adore and fear you, and all it takes is a little effort to open their eyes to the only truth..." {n}She lowers her voice.{/n} "...that their god is right here, in the flesh."

traits.locale_text: « C'est tout bonnement merveilleux ! Vos sujets vous craignent autant qu'ils vous adorent. Il vous suffira d'un rien pour leur ouvrir les yeux sur l'unique vérité... » {n}Elle baisse la voix.{/n} « ... Que leur dieu est ici même, en chair et en os. »

languages.text: «¡Es maravilloso! Su gente le adora y le teme, y basta un poco de esfuerzo para abrirles los ojos a la única verdad...». {n}Baja la voz.{/n} «... que su dios{mf||a} está aquí, en carne y hueso».
languages.original_text: "It is marvellous! Your people adore and fear you, and all it takes is a little effort to open their eyes to the only truth..." {n}She lowers her voice.{/n} "...that their god is right here, in the flesh."

traits.locale_text: «¡Es maravilloso! Su gente le adora y le teme, y basta un poco de esfuerzo para abrirles los ojos a la única verdad...». {n}Baja la voz.{/n} «... que su dios{mf||a} está aquí, en carne y hueso».

languages.text: 「誠に素晴らしい！あなたの人民はあなたをしたい、畏れています。必要なのは、唯一の真実へと彼らの目を開かせるためのちょっとした努力だけ…」{n}彼女は声を低くする。{/n}「…彼らの神はここに、肉体を持って顕現なされているのだと」
languages.original_text: "It is marvellous! Your people adore and fear you, and all it takes is a little effort to open their eyes to the only truth..." {n}She lowers her voice.{/n} "...that their god is right here, in the flesh."

traits.locale_text: 「誠に素晴らしい！あなたの人民はあなたをしたい、畏れています。必要なのは、唯一の真実へと彼らの目を開かせるためのちょっとした努力だけ…」{n}彼女は声を低くする。{/n}「…彼らの神はここに、肉体を持って顕現なされているのだと」

languages.text: “这简直是神迹！您的人民既崇拜您，又惧怕您。只要稍加努力，他们就会睁开双眼，看到唯一的真理……”{n}她压低了声音。{/n}“……他们的神明就在这里，在他们身边。”
languages.original_text: "It is marvellous! Your people adore and fear you, and all it takes is a little effort to open their eyes to the only truth..." {n}She lowers her voice.{/n} "...that their god is right here, in the flesh."

traits.locale_text: “这简直是神迹！您的人民既崇拜您，又惧怕您。只要稍加努力，他们就会睁开双眼，看到唯一的真理……”{n}她压低了声音。{/n}“……他们的神明就在这里，在他们身边。”

languages.text: "Gerçekten muazzam! Emrinizdekiler size hem hayranlık hem de korku besliyor ve de gözlerini gerçeğe açmak için gerekecek çaba hiç de büyük değil." {n}Sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Tanrılarının kanlı canlı burada olduğu gerçeğine."
languages.original_text: "It is marvellous! Your people adore and fear you, and all it takes is a little effort to open their eyes to the only truth..." {n}She lowers her voice.{/n} "...that their god is right here, in the flesh."
